FROM gcr.io/oss-fuzz-base/base-builder@sha256:1b6a6993690fa947df74ceabbf6a1f89a46d7e4277492addcd45a8525e34be5a
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y make autoconf automake libtool g++ sqlite3 libsqlite3-dev pkg-config && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/OSGeo/proj.4 proj.4
WORKDIR proj.4
COPY build.sh $SRC/
